name: Music_3140.wav
caption: These are the sounds coming from a martial arts movie. There are male voices shouting at each other. Sounds of footsteps and the movements of fighting can be heard. The music in the background has a dramatic tune being played on the strings. The rhythmic background is composed of Chinese paigu drums and the gong. There is a feeling of tension in this track. Some parts of this recording can be sampled for use in beat-making.
